body_html: not sure what you are doing actually, but if you don't need to backprop through the elements and just want to query individual elements from a tensor, maybe converting the tensor to a list .tolist() could help.
body_text: not sure what you are doing actually, but if you don't need to backprop through the elements and just want to query individual elements from a tensor, maybe converting the tensor to a list .tolist() could help.
body: not sure what you are doing actually, but if you don't need to backprop through the elements and just want to query individual elements from a tensor, maybe converting the tensor to a list `.tolist()` could help.
